1664830.name: RuneScape Teatime Starter Pack
1664830.description:
Enjoy everything the RuneScape universe has to offer by unlocking all extra member content for a whole month, including loads of new skills, every quest in the game and plenty of new areas to explore. Plus, you’ll get a Steam-exclusive weapon and Treasure Hunter keys!

The Teatime Starter Pack includes:
· 1 Month Membership Access
· Bistromancer’s Staff
· 15 Treasure Hunter Keys

Note
· The DLC Bundle items are not tradeable or refundable.
· The Membership Access DLC bundle is a one-time purchase and is not recurring. Recurring memberships can only be purchased via the in-game interface.
1664830.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 德语, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西
